name: Personalize your own cuff Bracelet!!
description:
This is a great opportunity to create a special, unique gift for someone or for yourself! You can tell someone how much you love them, let them know they are important to you, or share a special quote that is meaningful to you. 

Any phrase is welcome, but you must be conscious of how long the phrase is. Try to keep it no more than 5-7 words.  If you are concerned about how long your phrase is, message me and Ill let you know if we can do it. 

I also can stamp a small heart, bird, little vine design, star, or a hashtag onto the bracelet. 

This absolutely awesome creation will be hand stamped by me, so it is absolutely unique! All the bracelets are made to order, so make sure to specify which color band you would like sent out to you. If you want any gears added onto it (like in some of my other products) just let me know. 

This bracelet will be measured to fit virtually any wrist, and is flexible so that once you receive it you can fit it just to your size.

If you have any questions regarding this item feel free to contact me and ask away! 





Make sure to contact me with what you want on the bracelet when you place your order or I will not know what to stamp!!!

name: "Not all those who wander are lost" LOTR Quote Cuff Bracelet
description:
"All that is gold does not glitter,
Not all those who wander are lost;
The old that is strong does not wither,
Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken,
A light from the shadows shall spring;
Renewed shall be blade that was broken,
The crownless again shall be king."
-JRR Tolkien

This absolutely awesome creation was handstamped by me, so it is absolutely unique! All the bracelets are made to order, so make sure to specify which color band you would like sent out to you. 

Depending on my supply of bands it will either come wide (1/2") as seen in the picture above, or in a thinner (1/4") version. The wide version is only available in brass and copper. 

This bracelet has been measured to fit virtually any wrist, and is flexible so that once you receive it you can fit it just to your size.

If you have any questions regarding this item feel free to contact me and ask away!

name: "All you need is love" The Beatles Quote Cuff Bracelet
description:
"All you need is love, love.... love is all you need"

This super cute cuff bracelet is stamped with the phrase "All you need is love" and reminds us that the most important thing is the people that we care about in our life. This bracelet would be a perfect gift for someone in your life that always puts a smile on your face, or a Beatles fan.

This absolutely awesome creation was handstamped by me, so it is absolutely unique! This piece can be made in copper, brass (as shown in the picture), or aluminum. 

All the bracelets are made to order, so make sure to specify which color band you would like sent out to you.

This bracelet has been measured to fit virtually any wrist, and is flexible so that once you receive it you can fit it just to your size.

If you have any questions regarding this item feel free to contact me and ask away!

name: You Are My Sunshine Cuff Bracelet
description:
You are my sunshine... my only sunshine... you make me happy when skies are gray... youll never know dear, how much I love you... please dont take my sunshine away!

This super cute cuff bracelet is stamped with the phrase "You are my sunshine" and has a silver gear riveted onto it to give it a fun Steampunk feel. This bracelet would be a perfect gift for someone in your life that always brightens your day!

This absolutely awesome creation was handstamped by me, so it is absolutely unique! This piece can be made in copper, brass (as shown in the picture), or aluminum. 

All the bracelets are made to order, so make sure to specify which color band you would like sent out to you.  

This bracelet has been measured to fit virtually any wrist, and is flexible so that once you receive it you can fit it just to your size. 

If you have any questions regarding this item feel free to contact me and ask away!
